name: Mugger on the clock!
description:
Goal:
Grab as much gold as you can before the time runs out!

Tips:
If cops get too close it's game over!
Security cameras reduces 5 seconds from your timer.
Bash the ATMs to get extra money.

Controls:
WASD - Arrows : Movement
Gamepad Left Stick - DPAD : Movement
Space / A Button: Bash ATM (Multiple times)

Notes:
Done in Godot 3.3 for MiniJam 85 : Gold
